name: transactions
description: Generate realistic financial transaction records for a payment processing system

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: Reference to a user, between 1001 and 1100

fields.name: type
fields.description: Transaction type: purchase, refund, or subscription

fields.name: category
fields.description: Spending category: food, transport, entertainment, utilities, shopping, software

fields.name: is_flagged
fields.description: Whether the transaction is flagged as suspicious
